concept.title: PGI 211.274-2 Policy for unique item identification.

conbody.p: (b)(2)(ii) Send the copy of the determination and findings required by DFARS 211.274- 2(b)(2)(i) to DPAP/Program Development and Implementation, Deputy Director, 3060 Defense Pentagon, 3B855, Washington, DC 20301-3060; or via email to: osd.pentagon.ousd-atl.mbx.pdi@mail.mil .
